instruction: Compose a thank you message to a teacher.
output:
Dear [teacher's name], 

Thank you for all of your hard work and dedication to teaching. You have made a lasting impact on my life and I am truly grateful for the knowledge and guidance you have provided me. Your passion for teaching and ability to inspire are unparalleled. I am thankful for everything you have done for me.

Thank you again for being an exemplary teacher.

Sincerely,
[Your name]
